data: The night was filled with vanilla and frangipanni odours and the endless sound of the rollers on the reef.
Maru: A Dream of the Sea
H. De Vere (Henry De Vere) Stacpoole
Stacpoole, H. De Vere (Henry De Vere), 1863-1951
